Title: Ice-Watch White rose gold toned skull watch ICE.SK.WRG.U.S.15
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Ice-Watch White rose gold toned skull watch ICE.SK.WRG.U.S.15 RRP £69.95 Now £39.95 Description This unisex Ice-Watch is perfect for everybody for everyday wear. The white silicone strap ensures a comfy yet stylish look whilst ensuring the security of the watch to the wrist with a buckle clasp. The watch has a round dial with multiple rose tone skulls circulating the dial adding a unique look. Each hour is marked with a notch that has been carved to notify of each hour that has passed by. Also in rose tone is the noticeable Ice logo that in positioned at the three hour mark. The width of the watch is 43mm in width and is approximately 5mm in depth making this the perfect Ice-Watch watch for man or woman to add to their collection. This watch is water resistant up to 100m and is advised that minor water sports like swimming to avoid damage.
